Articles.Content:
Got me a Logitec Gamepad F310 for games i play.. was wondering would it be compatable with KSP... If so how?

if not no worries i am getting a flight stick controller next month....

thanks
Dont' see why it wouldn't be, doesn't look like it has enough buttons though.
I would buy a joystick like a Logitec Extreme 3D Pro if you want to use a non-keyboard controller for KSP.
